ingredients.item: 1 half ciabatta, torn into bitesize pieces
140g bag Waitrose Watercress, Rocket and Spinach Salad

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6.  Toss the ciabatta with 1 tbsp of the oil, season and place on a large baking tray.  Bake for 8-10 minutes until golden.
Meanwhile, whisk the remaining oil, vinegar and honey together, pour over the plums and leave to marinade for 5 minutes.
Griddle the plums for 2-3 minutes, turning once, reserving the marinade.
Mix together the salad, tomatoes and croutons, toss in the reserved dressing and top with the griddled plums.
